entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cache Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ashcroft 07:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Snow level rising to 700 metres this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:19 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending before morning then cloudy. Snow level 600 metres. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:19 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:19 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
